body:
Hey guys, since I haven't completely left Avicus, I've decided to start a YouTube channel :) 
After 4 years of not being able to access my old YouTube account, I've managed to crack the code.
I'll be bumping this thread every time I post a new video (and yes, there will be Avicus videos).
Find my channel here :D

Latest Video
Survival Games Montage (Cold War)

All Videos
SG #1 Leave the Lights On (Render Test)

SG #1 Leave the Lights On (Render Test)

replies.body: Fake leaving post, ban!
replies.body_tagged: Fake leaving post, ban!

replies.body:
Your not suppose to be posting other server gameplay!1!1!

D. Forum Rules

  1. Do not encourage "flame wars" or other inflammatory discussions.
  2. Stay on topic in discussions. Posts not relating to the topic will be deleted without hesitation.
  3. Bumping topics is highly discouraged. If you believe a topic has not received the popularity you had hoped, you may bump the post with updates or new ideas that pertain to the topic.
  4. Inappropriate images and links, as mentioned in §A.2, will not be tolerated.
  5. Posts that discuss details regarding other Minecraft servers is not allowed. Certain sections of these posts may be obscured if the post exhibits any text that could be considered advertising.
  6. Titles should be formatted properly and directly relate to the topic you wish to discuss. Staff members reserve the right to modify any misleading, inaccurate or objectionable titles to create an easier and more streamline experience for users.
  7. Discussions surrounding personal updates, accomplishments or events is frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person. Punishments for this will only be distributed in the event that a user continuously uses the forums for this purpose alone.

replies.body:
AH. So I guess now I can just advertise my MCSG videos and my Badlion videos, my kohi videos and maybe even my OCN videos (soon to be made)? 

That rule should be taken off the forums then as it is going against the point that I'm trying to send out right now from the offficial rules on the forums >.>
If not taken off then enforce the god damn thing. No wonder people think avi staff are a joke.
There are rules stated and it's not being enforced xd

replies.body: When I was 8, I started making YouTube videos with these toys called Littlest Pet Shops. After years and years of doing the vids, I got really good at what I did :P Some kids at school found out though, and I got bullied a lot, so I just abandoned my channel. I'm pretty sure the majority of my subs are inactive anyways, so xD
